thread.title: Business overnighter
thread.title_full: Business overnighter - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: james27hunt
title: Business overnighter
text: As ever, comfortable and affordable stay in Premier Inn. Only a quick overnight stay but the staff were very helpful, polite and efficient. Room was comfortable and a good night sleep. Location was great for my business meetings in the City but far enough away from the tourist and commuter throng and great access for an early morning run along the river.
